sense.gloss: to adopt (e.g. a proposal), to accept, to take up (a topic, complaint, etc.), to listen to, to deal with, to treat, to report (news), to cover, to feature
to take away, to confiscate, to deprive (someone) of, to revoke, to disqualify, to cancel

sdata.j: ↑悪質↑↓あくしつ↓なドライバーは↑免許↑↓めんきょ↓↑証↑↓しょう↓を↑取↑↓|と↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げる|べきだ。
sdata.e: Bad drivers should have their licenses taken away from them.

sdata.j: そのテレビ↑番組↑↓ばんぐみ↓は↑新↑↓あたら↓しい↑問題↑↓もんだい↓をよく↑取↑↓|と↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げる|。
sdata.e: New problems are often brought up on that TV programme.

sdata.j: この↑論文↑↓ろんぶん↓では↑交渉↑↓こうしょう↓における↑仲介↑↓ちゅうかい↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓に↑関↑↓かん↓する↑困難↑↓こんなん↓↑点↑↓てん↓は↑何↑↓なに↓かという↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を|とりあげる|。
sdata.e: In this paper I address the question, what is difficult about the intermediary's position in a negotiation?

sdata.j: ↑誰↑↓だれ↓が↑最初↑↓さいしょ↓にその↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を↑取↑↓|と↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げる|のだろうか。
sdata.e: Who will raise the question in the first place?

sdata.j: ↑電話↑↓でんわ↓が↑鳴↑↓な↓る。スーザンは↑受話器↑↓じゅわき↓を↑取↑↓|と↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げる|。
sdata.e: The telephone rings. Susan picks it up.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑提案↑↓ていあん↓は↑話↑↓はなし↓に|とりあげる|ほどのこともない。
sdata.e: His proposal is not worth talking about.
